name: ANDROMALIUS
summary: It’s a dark interactive story, about a young man that has just moved into his new apartment. The first night in any new space can be weird and unsettling. The new sounds, the neighbors and the constant thoughts of ones actual safety.
storyline: It’s a dark interactive story, about a young man that has just moved into his new apartment. The first night in any new space can be weird and unsettling. The new sounds, the neighbors and the constant thoughts of ones actual safety.
